mergeResults.content: STATE: Recovering from complete mind-merge with Rance under Healer Crescent's care; profoundly overwhelmed but unharmed; worked through buried trauma during merge—decades of self-doubt, fear of Empathy consuming identity, isolation from carrying kingdom's burdens alone; left in better emotional state than before despite overwhelm. SHARED: Rance now possesses her complete life—escape from Sensholding, Rolan's Choosing, Empathy awakening, every state secret, all training, wine preferences (47 vintage), every private moment. STANCE-Rance: Intimate knowledge shared both ways; he saw her deepest vulnerabilities; complicated mix of violation/gratitude/fascination; their passionate kiss closed the connection; uncertain how relationship will proceed.
